entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
